name: Red
background: A sentient courier droid designed and maintained by her engineer mother, Dr. Hood. Raised in a family that values independence and scientific integrity.
motivation: Protect her family's secret data, ensure its safe delivery to her grandmother, and later, join the resistance to uphold her family's legacy.

name: Dr. Hood
background: A skilled engineer who created and looks after Red. Works against the interests of the controlling megacorp. Entrusts Red with critical, classified information.
motivation: Ensure her daughter’s safety, keep the data out of corporate hands, and support the resistance movement.

name: Grandmother (Dr. Hood’s mother)
role: Recipient of the data; retired scientist
background: A retired scientist living in seclusion on a lunar outpost. Once involved in major scientific breakthroughs and possibly in the resistance.
motivation: Decrypt the data, protect her family, and aid the resistance against corporate control.

name: Agent Wolfe
traits: Relentless, cunning, intimidating, ruthless, technologically skilled
background: A bounty hunter employed by the megacorp, augmented with cybernetics for tracking and combat. Specializes in hunting down corporate threats.
motivation: Retrieve the data for the megacorp, prove his prowess, and assert dominance over Red and her family.

name: Station Security Chief
role: Minor antagonist; head of lunar outpost security
background: Responsible for the security of the lunar outpost. Intimidated or convinced by Wolfe to reveal access codes.
motivation: Maintain order at the outpost, avoid conflict with powerful operatives.

name: Resistance Contact
role: Ally; member of the underground resistance
background: Operative in the resistance who receives the decrypted data from Red and her grandmother.
motivation: Fight against corporate tyranny and protect scientific freedom.

name: Corporate Executive (Megacorp)
background: High-ranking official in the megacorp overseeing the operation to recover the data.
motivation: Acquire the classified data to further corporate dominance and suppress opposition.

name: Docking Bay Mechanic
background: Works at the spaceport and may provide Red with technical assistance or cover during her escape.
motivation: Maintain the docking bays, help those in need, avoid trouble with authorities.
